About SpinalCodeZ

Since learning code, programming has become a goal that needed to be reached.


I am SpinalCodeZ and have experience in C# HTML5, CSS, Tailwind, JavaScript, SQL.


I looked into coding when I was young but really only used it to do basic math problems. I didn't really start studying until recently. It's fair to say the real journey began October 2023. I am still new, but with time and practice I will become a dev in no time. With a great community and wonderful friends my learning experience has been more than pleasant.


A little about me personally on the other hand, I am 23 and have a beautiful wife and four amazing children. I play games, code, and watch tv/movies in my free time. I work at a pretty decent job in production. I have several social media platforms including twitch and youtube. I dont really find social media to be fun, but since people can build a community and make decent money why not try. I perfer to be alone in the dark while staring at my computer screen, which sounds worse than it is. I'm not depressed, I just enjoy coding.
